<p> NormalInterpolator generates a series of normal (perpendicular) 3-tuple SFVec3f values. Each vector value has unit length, i.e. the set of allowed vectors describes the surface of a unit sphere. Authors can ROUTE value_changed output events to a Normal node's vector field, or to another 3-tuple SFVec3f field. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#NormalInterpolator" target="_blank">NormalInterpolator</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/interp.html" target="_blank">19 Interpolation component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/interp.html#Concepts" target="_blank">19.2 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/interp.html#NormalInterpolator" target="_blank">19.4.5 NormalInterpolator</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter19NormalsShading/Figure19_27SquareFaceAnimatingNormalsIndex.html" target="_blank">Chapter 19 Normals Shading, Figure 19 27 Square Face Animating Normals</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter07EventAnimationInterpolation" target="_blank">Chapter 07 Event Animation Interpolation</a> </li> </ul>
